description: ADH_APP_ORIG_XREF Original system reference used for conversion only
ADH_DUE_DT Stores the due date for the Account
ADH_DUE_AMT Stores the due amount for the Account
ADH_BALANCE_AMT Stores the balance amount for the due date
ADH_ACTUAL_DAYS_PAST_DUE Stores the Actual days from the last due date
ADH_PMT_SATISFIED_IND Indicates the payment satisfied is allowed for the account
ADH_PMT_DT Stores the Payment date for the account
ADH_PMT_AMT Stores the Payment amount for the account
ADH_PRIMARY_IND Indicator specifying whether the due date is the primary due date or not
ADH_TXN_SET_ID System generated unique identification number for transaction set
